zh.title: 教皇约翰·保罗二世首次访问美国
中国女排首次获得奥运会冠军
美国通过《移民改革与控制法案》
巴西圣保罗州监狱发生大规模骚乱
美国宣布成立国土安全部
里约热内卢获得2016年奥运会举办权
哥伦比亚就和平协议举行全民公投

en.title: Pope John Paul II began his first papal visit to the United States.
U.S. Senate approves a bill to eliminate the gold backing of the dollar.
Berlin is officially reunified after 41 years of division.
Caracas prison riot in Venezuela leaves over 60 dead.
The Electronic Frontier Foundation files suit against the Communications Decency Act.
The sniper attacks begin in the Washington, D.C. area.
Rio de Janeiro was selected to host the 2016 Summer Olympics.
Jamal Khashoggi enters the Saudi consulate in Istanbul and is murdered.
Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine awarded to Katalin Karikó and Drew Weissman for mRNA vaccines.
